name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ghost Modern Warfare Call of Duty Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring Ghost to your browser! Download now for a thrilling Modern Warfare live wallpaper and an immersive new tab experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the elite soldier Ghost to your browser! Download now for a thrilling Modern Warfare live wallpaper and an immersive new tab experience.

Step into the action with the Ghost Modern Warfare Call of Duty Live Wallpaper extension! Every time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted by an epic, high-quality live wallpaper featuring the legendary Ghost from Call of Duty: Modern Warfare. Immerse yourself in the world of tactical warfare and intense combat, with stunning visuals from the iconic game.

Key Features:
Dynamic Ghost Live Wallpaper: Enjoy animated backgrounds that capture the gritty atmosphere of Modern Warfare with Ghost in action.
Clock & Date Display: Keep track of your day while surrounded by your favorite soldier, Ghost.
Quick Access Links: Easily access your most-used sites with one-click shortcuts right from your new tab.
Easy-to-Use Options: Discover additional extensions, read the privacy policy, or uninstall the extension with ease.

Perfect for Call of Duty fans, this extension brings the intensity of the battlefield to your browser. Whether you’re a fan of Ghost’s story or just love Modern Warfare, this extension offers a personalized browsing experience.

Download now and bring the legendary Ghost to your new tab with every click!
